app.name: XRick (Rick Dangerous)
app.short_description: Reimplementation of classic Rick Dangerous game
app.long_description:
Use Wii Remote horizontally
'left / up / right / down' : "DPAD" 'fire' : "2" 'fire bullet' : "2 + UP" 'lay dynamite' : "2 + DOWN" 'poke with stick' : "2 + (LEFT / RIGHT)" 'exit' : "HOME" 'cycle through worlds' : "B" 'toggle unlimited: lives, bombs, bullets' : "MINUS" 'toggle: no collision' : "PLUS"
Link : https://github.com/bomblik/xrick_wii/releases
